name: Low income with full IETC
description: Individual earning NZD 30,000 per year with full Independent Earner Tax Credit

sources.description: Calculated using 2025-26 PAYE rates, ACC levy, and IETC from IRD
sources.notes: PAYE: 10.5% up to $15,600 + 17.5% up to $53,500. ACC: 1.67%. IETC: Full $520 for income between $24,000 and $66,000.
